document.full_text: prince charles urges nations to step back from current methods of mechanized factory farming and meat production, saying they are depleting the soil, devouring water supplies, exacerbating climate change and poisoning streams and oceans.
document.title: the sustainable prince
lines_and_colors: prince charles urges nations to step back from current methods of mechanized factory farming and meat production, saying they are depleting the soil, devouring water supplies, exacerbating climate change and poisoning streams and oceans.
